module.name: Queue Priorities
module.description: Adds the ability to set a callers priority higher before entering a queue
module.changelog: *15.0.10* FREEI-924 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *15.0.9* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.8* FREEPBX-20378 Restoring legacy(FreePBX 14) Backup into FreePBX 15 system is not restoring Queue Priorities entries. *15.0.7* FREEPBX-20422 Restoring FreePBX 15 system is not restoring Queue Priority entries. *15.0.6* Bugfix/FREEPBX-20031 *15.0.5* Fixing FREEPBX-17867 *15.0.4* fixing legacy restore *15.0.3* FREEPBX-18351 After adding/editing a Queue Priority entry the page is not redirecting to list page *15.0.2* FREEPBX-15215 Multiple Queue Priority can be added with same Description *15.0.1* Add new Implementation Backup for 15 version.
